text: (nabiye!) mema pratiksepa karannan (oba gæna) “mohu kerehi mohuge deviyangen (api kæmati akarayata) ek sadhakayak pahala kala yutu noveda?” yayi pavasannaha. (nabiye!) oba, biya ganva anaturu angavannama (misa, vena kisivaku nova. ebævin ovun kæmati akarayatama oba kala yutuya yanna obage yutukamak nova). tavada sæma samuhayantama (oba) ek margopadesakayeku(da vannehiya)
